resources.string: contact_shield_demo
MainActivity
Home
Dashboard
Notifications
FAQ
Settings
"I have not tested positive."
"I tested positive for Covid-19."
"mountains picture"
"Wash your hands frequently with soap and water or with alcohol hand sanitizer."
"Comply with the current regulations in your area."
"Wear a mask in indoor public places. This includes public transport and all situations where it is not possible to ensure that a safe distance is maintained at all times."
"Respect physical distancing measures if you have to leave the house."
"Staying connect with your friends during this difficult time is important, but please do so without physical contact."
"What are Contact Shield APIs?"
"Contact Shield is a basic BLE-based contact tracing service provided by HMS Core."
"What are the permissions that needs to be allowed for the app to work?"
"Storage permission for this app is required. Also, for HMS Core, Storage and Location permissions need to be allowed. This Location permission will be used for Bluetooth only not GPS."
"What version of HMS Core is needed for Contact Shield to work?"
"HMS Core 5.0.1.307 or later"
"How is privacy guaranteed with HMS Core Contact Shield?"

"The following measures are taken to protect user privacy:
• Users can determine whether to enable Contact Shield, whether to upload anonymous identifiers to the cloud and whether to obtain diagnosis results by themselves (all these functions can be disabled in the settings page)
• The Contact Shield SDK does not collect any personal data. It only used dynamically generated anonymous IDs to identify users and does not use any privacy information such as user locations and phone numbers. In addition, anonymous IDs on the cloud can be stored only for a limited period (14 days).
• After the user uninstalls an app using Contact Shield APIs, the user’s historical data stored in the device will be deleted. A user can also manually delete all historical data using the “clear data” button in the settings page.
• Decentralized data storage on user devices guarantees data privacy. All the data you see on the dashboard of your home page (number of hits and your risk level) is only showed and stored on your device.
• Bluetooth is used to send constantly changing random IDs from other devices that installed the app. No personal or location data is sent or stored. "
"How can I allow the app to run in the background?"

"By default, our app does not run in the background. You can allow the application to run in background by adjusting “Power Usage Details” in the settings for this app. You can click on “App launch” and select “Run in background”, the app will keep running in the background."
"Will the device battery drain more quickly with the app running in the background?"
"Our app uses the latest energy-efficient BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) technology, which will not drain your battery while running in the background."
"How can I submit a positive test report?"

"You can report a positive test by clicking the “report a positive test” button once you select “I tested positive for Covid-19” in the home page. You can verify your positive test report by either scanning a QR code or Requesting a TeleTAN."
"What does the statistics on the dashboard mean and how can I update it?"

" • Number of hits: The displayed number of hits is the total number of hits since installation or the latest clear data.
• Risk Level: Each hit comes with a risk level, here we display the maximum risk level since installation or the latest clear data.
• Refresh: Patients will upload their anonymous IDs to the server daily. Once you click the Refresh button in the home page, you download the newly added IDs and check with the Bluetooth signals it has collected. If the app finds a match, the number of hits and risk level will be updated.
• Clear data: Once you click the clear data button in the settings page, you removed all the data related to contact shield before and restart the contact shield engine."
"When will I get alerted?"
"The device will generate an alert if when the risk level of a user is greater than or equal to medium."

"If you have been tested positive for COVID-19, you can share your test results to help notify others who may have been in contact with you. This will let others know they should monitor for symptoms. Only those who have been exposed will receive a notification."
"This unique verification code is provided by your testing center, and it is used to verify your positive test result."
"Your test date helps the app know when you may have been contagious and notify others who have been in contact with you from the past 14 days."
"When the App is disabled, your device will not send or receive signals from other users."

"When Periodic Key upload is disabled, the device will stop uploading your periodic keys to the server, and others will not be able to download your periodic key if you are tested positive. New periodic keys will be generated and stored locally on the device."
"When notifications are turned off, your device will not receive any notifications for potential exposures or interactions with other users."

string.name: alert_heading
string.b: "You have been in contact with a Covid-19 Patient!"

resources.string: "Someone you have been in contact with recently have self-reported positive. Please self-quarantine or get tested at your local testing center."
"You have received an announcement"
"There has been an announcement for you: There is a curfew from 9 p.m. tonight until 5 a.m. tomorrow morning. Please stay indoors tonight."
"Choose Verification Method"
"Scan QR code"
"Register your test by scanning the QR code that can be found in your testing documents."
"Request TeleTAN"
"Please call us if you have been diagnosed of COVID-19 but do not have a QR code."
"How this works"
"Call the hotline to request a TeleTAN:"
"Your report is successfully submitted"
"Thank you for submitting your report. We will now notify others who have been in contact with you. Make sure to stay safe and self isolate."
"There is an error in your submission"
"Please recheck your QR code or teleTAN. Make sure it is not expired and that you have entered your information correctly."
"No Internet Connection"
"Please check your internet settings and make sure your phone is connect in order to proceed your submission."
MainActivity
